That's all I know though. Haven't used this API before.

My suggestion is to build the back-end points of such application with strong authentication. Which mean only registered clients can make queries to function their installed app. That is way, even though some choose to republish the app without pay royalties to the developer, it won't work.

Every authenticated client should have a valid and unique authentication hash key/token that is only valid for his installed device. That is mean such app will need to access to the unique info that can define such device then use it to generate such unique hash key or token.
